title: Angels Set of 3
description: A beautiful set of three angel paintings, each 9x12 inches. These healing-inspired pieces bring peace and comfort to any space.

title: Rustic Barn
description: A peaceful rural scene featuring a classic red barn against a blue sky. Perfect for country-style decor.

title: Mermaid Dreams
description: An enchanting underwater scene with a graceful mermaid. Captures the magic and mystery of the ocean.

title: Mermaid Dreams II
description: Another beautiful mermaid painting with different color tones and composition.

title: Big Red Lighthouse
description: A striking lighthouse scene featuring the iconic red lighthouse. Perfect Florida coastal art.

title: Pumpkin Man
description: A whimsical character painting featuring a friendly pumpkin man. Great for autumn decor or year-round charm.

title: Love Tree
description: A romantic tree scene symbolizing love and growth. Perfect for couples or anyone celebrating love.

title: Sunburst
description: A vibrant abstract piece featuring warm sunburst colors. Brings energy and warmth to any room.

title: Big Sky
description: A sweeping landscape showcasing vast skies and open spaces. Captures the feeling of freedom and possibility.

title: Corey's Turtle
description: A charming turtle print perfect for nature lovers. Available as prints only.

title: Graceful Swan
description: An elegant swan painting showcasing grace and beauty. Perfect for serene spaces.

title: Pumpkin Patch Pair
description: A delightful pair of pumpkin patch paintings. Perfect for autumn decorating or year-round farmhouse charm.

title: Red Sky
description: A dramatic sky painting with rich red tones. Creates a striking focal point in any room.

title: Beach Day
description: A sunny beach scene that captures the joy of a perfect day by the ocean. Florida-inspired art.

title: Blessings
description: A meaningful piece celebrating life's blessings. Perfect for a meditation or prayer space.

title: Koi Fish
description: A peaceful koi fish painting symbolizing good fortune and perseverance. Great for zen spaces.

title: Lavender Fields
description: A calming lavender field painting that brings peace and tranquility to any space.

title: Blue Sparkle
description: An abstract piece with shimmering blue tones. Adds elegance and sophistication to any room.

title: Wavy Blue
description: A flowing abstract painting with ocean-like blue waves. Perfect for creating a calming atmosphere.

title: Full Moon
description: A mystical full moon scene that captures the magic of nighttime. Great for bedroom or meditation space.

title: Blue Calm
description: A serene blue abstract painting that promotes relaxation and peace. Perfect for stress-free environments.

title: Night Sea
description: A peaceful nighttime seascape that brings the tranquility of the ocean into your home.

title: Sunshine
description: A bright and cheerful painting that radiates warmth and happiness. Perfect for bringing light into any room.

title: Behind the Fence
description: A charming rural scene that captures the beauty of country life. Great for farmhouse or rustic decor.

title: On the Shore
description: A beautiful coastal scene that captures the peacefulness of a day by the water.
